√lok 'look'

present: [1.] lokate etc.  

perfect: luloke  

aorist: [1.] aloki   -- [3.] alulokat   -- [5.] alokiṣṭa  

[future: lokiṣyate  lokitā  ]

verbal: lokitum  

secondary: causative: lokayati etc. E.+  lokayate etc. E.+  lokyate etc.  

derivatives: -loka E.+  -lokaka E.+  -lokin S.+  -lokya E.+  -lokana C.  -lokanīya E.+  -lokayitṛ C.  -lokayitavya C.  

Doubtless from √ruc, through a noun loka: compare also √loc.
